name: csc202-partner-logistics
description: Clarifies partner swap rules and deadlines in CSC 202.

events.content: Our CSC 202 partner keeps missing labs. Can we switch teams mid-quarter?
Yes, but only during the first two weeks. After that you need instructor approval.
Email the lab coordinator with both partners CC’d. Provide evidence (missed commits, attendance). They’ll approve a swap or solo grading plan within 48 hours.
Do we still submit one repo while waiting?
Correct. Keep pushing to the shared repo until the coordinator tells you otherwise; they’ll split grades retroactively if needed.
